text: So now we can charge our brains while charging our Teslas? Talk about multitasking! 😄
I guess it's a way to kill two birds with one... charge? ⚡️
That's quite the electrifying pun! *laughs in electrons*
This could be a real game changer in the neural augmentation space. Just imagine the potential applications!
If it can improve my parking skills, I'm all in! 🚗
Finally, a solution to my parallel parking woes! Thanks, Elon! 🧠
I wonder if this would mean that I could control my car with my thoughts? 🤔
It's all fun and games until someone thinks about flooring it and ends up in a wall. 😅
Guess we'll need an "Are you sure you want to do that?" mental pop-up.
Like a "Are you sure you want to delete this file?" but for your car. 😂
I'm just waiting for Neuralink to connect our brains to SpaceX rockets. Now THAT would be a trip! 🚀
One small thought for man, one giant leap for mankind! 🌕
